email-channel.subject: <#-- Проектный номер --> <#assign formula = "select coalesce(prjnumprist, '') as prjnumprist,coalesce(prjnumcounter::text, '') as prjnumcounter,coalesce(prjnumfin, '') as prjnumfin from apr_list JOIN nunid2punid_map n2p on substring(apr_list.RKKId, 1, 32) = n2p.nunid join f_dp_rkk rkk on cast(substring(n2p.punid, 1, 4) as int) = rkk.id_type and cast(substring(n2p.punid, 5, 12) as int) = rkk.id where apr_list.id = {0}"> <#assign projectNumber = session.findByQuery(formula, document.getId())> <#if projectNumber.size()!=0> <#if projectNumber.get(0).getString("prjnumprist")??><#assign projectNumberValueprist = projectNumber.get(0).getString("prjnumprist")><#else><#assign projectNumberValueprist = ''></#if> <#if projectNumber.get(0).getString("prjnumcounter")??><#assign projectNumberValuecounter = projectNumber.get(0).getString("prjnumcounter")><#else><#assign projectNumberValuecounter = ''></#if> <#if projectNumber.get(0).getString("prjnumfin")??><#assign projectNumberValuefin = projectNumber.get(0).getString("prjnumfin")><#else><#assign projectNumberValuefin = ''></#if> <#assign projectNumberValue = projectNumberValueprist + projectNumberValuecounter + projectNumberValuefin> <#else><#if document.get("IdRealDoc")??><#assign plunid = document.get("IdRealDoc")?substring(0,32)><#if plunid??><#assign d1 = idConverter.unid2PlatformId(plunid)><#if d1??><#if crudService.find(d1).getString("RegNumber")??><#assign projectNumberValue = crudService.find(d1).getString("RegNumber")><#else></#if><#else></#if><#else></#if><#else></#if></#if> <#-- /Проектный номер --> <#if document.get("Subject")??><#assign subjectName = document.get("Subject")><#else><#assign subjectName = ''></#if> Обработка согласования. <#if document.get("doctype")??>${document.get("doctype")}<#else></#if> от <#if document.get("rdate")??>${document.get("rdate")}<#else></#if> проект № <#if projectNumberValue??>${projectNumberValue}<#else></#if> «<#if subjectName?length < 61>${subjectName}<#else>${subjectName?substring(0,60)}...</#if>»
email-channel.body-html:
<#-- Проектный номер --> <#assign formula = "select coalesce(prjnumprist, '') as prjnumprist,coalesce(prjnumcounter::text, '') as prjnumcounter,coalesce(prjnumfin, '') as prjnumfin from apr_list JOIN nunid2punid_map n2p on substring(apr_list.RKKId, 1, 32) = n2p.nunid join f_dp_rkk rkk on cast(substring(n2p.punid, 1, 4) as int) = rkk.id_type and cast(substring(n2p.punid, 5, 12) as int) = rkk.id where apr_list.id = {0}"> <#assign projectNumber = session.findByQuery(formula, document.getId())> <#if projectNumber.size()!=0> <#if projectNumber.get(0).getString("prjnumprist")??><#assign projectNumberValueprist = projectNumber.get(0).getString("prjnumprist")><#else><#assign projectNumberValueprist = ''> <#if projectNumber.get(0).getString("prjnumcounter")??><#assign projectNumberValuecounter = projectNumber.get(0).getString("prjnumcounter")><#else><#assign projectNumberValuecounter = ''> <#if projectNumber.get(0).getString("prjnumfin")??><#assign projectNumberValuefin = projectNumber.get(0).getString("prjnumfin")><#else><#assign projectNumberValuefin = ''> <#assign projectNumberValue = projectNumberValueprist + projectNumberValuecounter + projectNumberValuefin> <#else><#if document.get("IdRealDoc")??><#assign plunid = document.get("IdRealDoc")?substring(0,32)><#if plunid??><#assign d1 = idConverter.unid2PlatformId(plunid)><#if d1??><#if crudService.find(d1).getString("RegNumber")??><#assign projectNumberValue = crudService.find(d1).getString("RegNumber")><#else><#else><#else><#else> <#-- /Проектный номер -->

Для: <#if document.get("IdAuthor.Orig_ShortName")??>${document.get("IdAuthor.Orig_ShortName")}<#else>

Модуль: <#assign formula = "SELECT name FROM ss_module sm left join apr_list on substring(apr_list.rkkid,34,49) = sm.replica left join ss_moduletype sm2 on sm2.id = sm.type WHERE apr_list.id = {0}"> <#assign collection = session.findByQuery(formula, document.getId())> ${collection.get(0).getString("name")}

Заголовок: <#if document.get("doctype")??>${document.get("doctype")}<#else> от <#if document.get("rdate")??>${document.get("rdate")}<#else> проект № <#if projectNumberValue??>${projectNumberValue}<#else> «<#if document.get("Subject")??>${document.get("Subject")}<#else>»

<#assign formula = "select coalesce(avr.text, '') as text from apr_voresult_reply as avr join Apr_VOResult as aprres on avr.owner = aprres.id left join apr_listortempl as aprlist on aprlist.id = (select substr(npm.punid, 5, 12)::int from nunid2punid_map as npm where nunid = aprres.RefVisaDocId) left join apr_list apr ON apr.id = aprlist.id where apr.id = {0}"> <#assign aprRes = session.findByQuery(formula, document.getId())>
